Token.Abstract: * Sensor for storing location updates. Every time a new update comes in, it is stored. The rate with which updates come in is up to iOS.
Store a new location point in the location sensor. If the sensor is not enabled the point will not be stored.

Parameter.Name: desired
Parameter.Abstract: accuracy, used to check if the new point should be accepted or not

ReturnValue.Abstract: returns whether the new location point was accepted. Note that if the sensor is not enabled the point will not be stored.
